content.p: The University of Nottingham has a broad range of research equipment which is overseen by the Facilities and Equipment Management Committee. Our research equipment is listed on the Kit-Catalogue database and also through our membership of the MI Group of research intensive universities. UNICAS is the University wide initiative to increase equipment sharing and research collaboration across all Faculties and campuses. For further information, please contact Joe Shearring. Get in touch: research.innovation@nottingham.ac.uk Jubilee Conference Centre Jubilee Campus Triumph Road Nottingham, NG8 1DH
